page.title: 16Families - Holly
page.content: My name is Holly Kim Gunton and I have a cat called Pickles. I live in a new farmhouse that my Dad built, it is called Vale Farm. The old one was burned down. My Mum is called Yvonne and my Dad is called Terry. I have not got any brothers or sisters. I am 8 years old and I was born in Ipswich and we lived in Laxfield before we came to Wenhaston. I like school very much. My teacher's name is Mr. Marshall. He is the headmaster. I am learning to play the violin with Mrs. Jenner. I go to lessons in Lowestoft on Saturday mornings. I sometimes take part in concerts. I like reading, especially Enid Blyton stories. I like toys and my favourite one is my doll which turns its head and is called Nina.
